articles.description: For years we've been calling 720p as HD (high-definition). But according to a new change rolled out by YouTube, 720p is no longer HD. Let's fight! YouTube Stops Calling 720p as HD, Anything Below 1080p is Standard Definition - Do You Agree? We know how things…
articles.content:
For years we've been calling 720p as HD (high-definition). But according to a new change rolled out by YouTube, 720p is no longer HD. Let's fight!
We know how things are in the world of video. If it's 360p or 480p, we straight up call it 'standard definition… [+1820 chars]

articles.title: Edison Mail iOS bug showed messages intended for other people - Engadget
